name: In My Memories
description:
"Show Me the most damaged part of your soul and I will show you how it still shines like Gold"Nikita Gill

This game allows you to  self-discover yourself as it carefully tackles the delicate issue of increasing Depression. Help Saya rediscover her past and make careful decisions.. as  It ends on hope for some.... while for others, it leads to an inevitable loss.
Regardless, it's up to You to decide... whether you want to wait for hope, or BE the one you're looking for.
